name: Apple / German Pancake
ingredients: 2 – Apples (Gala or MacIntosh, not Red Delicious or Granny Smith), sliced thinly
As needed – cinnamon and brown sugar for Apple Pancakes
As needed – icing sugar and lemon for German Pancakes
instructions: Mix eggs, flour, sugar, milk, vanilla, and salt in a bowl
Melt butter in casserole dish in the oven until butter is hot but not burned
Apple Pancakes: Spread apple slice in hot butter and bake until apples sizzle, ~3 minutes
Pour a thin layer of batter into casserole, can use more batter if thicker pancakes are desired
Bake for ~13-15 minutes until a toothpick comes out of the batter clean
Apple Pancakes: spread cinnamon and brown sugar mixture over the top of pancake

additional_context.story: While Max and Isaac love apple pancakes, Jackie and Tori prefer German with icing sugar and lemon
additional_context.tips: This optionally makes 'German' Pancakes -- to do so, skip the apple pancake steps.
